content.question: Which of the following could Mr. Peña do to increase his ability to pass legislation following the 2012 elections?

choices.label: Mr. Peña can sign an executive order that forces the Chamber of Deputies to pass the president’s suggested legislation.
Mr. Peña can work with PAN officials to choose a leader for their party with the same legislative priorities.
Mr. Peña can ask the National Supreme Court of Justice to invalidate any laws that do not align with his agenda.
Mr. Peña can work with the PRI and PAN to establish a legislative agenda that is attractive to both parties.

content.answer: Mr. Peña can work with the PRI and PAN to establish a legislative agenda that is attractive to both parties.
